title: Hour 1: Lake Show
description:
In this episode, Domonique Foxworth, Chris "Mad Dog" Russo, and Brian Windhorst discuss the news of the Phoenix Suns matching the Pacers' offer to Deandre Ayton and how it impacts trade scenarios for Donovan Mitchell and Kevin Durant. Also debated is whether or not the Lakers are expected to improve this year after missing last year's playoffs and which player gets the most unfair criticism. And, as Tom Brady's 45th birthday approaches, the crew discusses how much longer they'd like to see The GOAT play. Karl Ravech joins the show to talk Home Run Derby stand-outs and teams in World Series contention.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Are the Lakers going to improve in 2022?
